pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru
meanings: failing to advance (to the next year)

pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru

lessons.japanese: もっと勉強しない限り落第しますよ。
lessons.english: You will fail unless you work harder.

lessons.japanese: 日本では、高校までは落第はありません。
lessons.english: In Japan we do not repeat a year until high school.

lessons.english: You will fail unless you work harder.

lessons.japanese: もっと勉強しない限り落第しますよ。
lessons.english: You'll fail unless you study harder.
